name: Shanghai Alliance
overview:
China is the fastest growing economy on the planet.

Unless your company is a mega-cap fortune 500 company, you need help establishing effective production and supply capabilities in China.

There is no better way to resolve issues, seek competitive pricing, or set up on-going quality assurance programs than face-to-face with your Chinese business partners.

The company can meet with manufactures or suppliers in China on your behalf and communicate those needs, establish manufacturing practices, debug production bottlenecks, and negotiate reduced pricing as your in-China representative.

With offices in New York and in Shanghai, they have a presence in both countries. They have expertise in a wide range of manufacturing and production issues and the staff is bi-lingual to facilitate easy and accurate communication. They are dedicated to ensuring that your project is completed in a timely cost-effective manner, whether it be a small production issue or a larger scale quality control program.

funding_round.source_description: Solix completes $16.8 million in Series A funding
